# Pull Request

## Summary
Brief description of what this PR changes and why.

## Related Issue(s)
Closes #[issue number]
Related to #[issue number]

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Test improvements

## Changes Made
Detailed description of the changes:
- [Change 1]
- [Change 2]
- [Etc.]

## Testing
How have you tested these changes? Include:
- [ ] Local testing completed
- [ ] Test cases added/updated
- [ ] All tests passing (`make test`)
- [ ] Manual testing steps:
  1. [Step 1]
  2. [Step 2]

## Documentation
- [ ] Updated README if needed
- [ ] Updated CLAUDE.md if architecture changed
- [ ] Added to CHANGELOG
- [ ] Code comments added where complexity warrants
- [ ] Added/updated tests as documentation

## Architecture/Design Notes
If this is a significant change, explain:
- What problem does this solve?
- How does it fit with existing architecture?
- Were there alternative approaches considered?
- Any potential impacts on other components?

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Comments are clear and helpful
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] No breaking changes (or breaking changes are documented)
- [ ] Dependencies are reasonable and documented

## Additional Context
Any additional information reviewers should know:
- Specific areas that need close review
- Known limitations or future work
- Dependency updates and their rationale
